programmes.show_name: Classic Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
programmes.show_description: A classic episode of the award-winning quiz show presented by Chris Tarrant in which contestants can win up to one million pounds.
Bradley Walsh hosts the game show that asks contestants to complete a series of general knowledge questions faster than The Chaser. (S7, ep 77)
Bradley Walsh hosts the game show that asks contestants to complete a series of general knowledge questions faster than The Chaser, a brainbox of the highest order. (S9, ep 93)

Dartboard quiz game that tests contestants' darts skills and their general knowledge.

Warwick Davis hosts the game show where 10 is the magic number as contestants put their general knowledge to the test for a £125,000 jackpot prize. (S5, ep 31)
Nigel Havers presents the show in which members of the public get expert advice on selling their antiques and collectables to a panel of dealers. (S2, ep 4)
Antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson travels the country, team in tow, hoping to snap up some good deals. But will the locals take the cash for their antiques or gamble at auction?
Stars compete to win money for charity with a little help from their families. Glitzy celebrity version of the classic family game show presented by Vernon Kay. (S2, ep 1)
Lily Savage hosts the game show in which contestants attempt to match the answers of as many of the six celebrity panellists as possible.

programmes.show_name: Celebrity Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
programmes.show_description: A classic episode of the award-winning quiz show in which celebrities can win up to a million pounds for charity. (S1, ep 8)
